##	Score (with Data) Network Overview

- **Goal:** Create a national network for developing and disseminating Sports Content for Outreach, Research, and Education in data science.

- **Description:** This four-year collaborative effort will create a network of educators and 50+ partners from sports teams and industry experts  across the country to develop authentic curricular modules to introduce data science topics via sports applications.

- **Funding Acknowledgement:** NSF Award #2142705. _Building a sustainable national network for developing and disseminating Sports Content for Outreach, Research, and Education in data science._

-	**Team:** [The 2023 Roster](https://scorenetwork.org/roster.html){target="_blank"}
